extendedInfo.description: Hanging cheat allows you to create the hardest word for your friends to guess.It also predicts which letters to guess based on your friends word.There are 2 functions:-creating a word, gives you the maximum scoring word with your available letters.-guessing a word, enter the word to guess just as you see it on the game. eg: ????Oas you reveal more letters, you can update the search. eg: AB??Oand exclude any guessed letters in the additional box.When guessing your friends word, you can find a recommended letter under the GO button, which suggests the most appropriate letter based on a calculation.new transparent background.-run hangman cheat, with notifications enabled.-launch hanging with friends-once you are in hanging with friends, from the notifications bar select Hangman cheat.-this will allow you to see the hanging with friends through hangman cheatcheck out our website for detailed instructionshttp://sites.google.com/site/droidbeanbeat your friends every single time at any Hangman type game. Easily integrates with hanging with friends.

reviews.title: Not cheating
reviews.comment: I use this app when I can\'t figure out what words to use. I don\'t see it as a cheat because I don\'t use it to find out other peoples words. Just a list of words for me to jse and its really helpful...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice but there are 2 bugs.
reviews.comment: I use this all the time. It even helps me learn words so i can function without the cheat. But -1 star for the word guesser displaying words with guessed letters that have already been established in their positions and how  many times they had been used. And -1 star for not being able to keep Hanging open in transparent background while using the cheat,  i have to write things down to remember the letters. Android VTAB1008 tablet. Vizio.
reviews.author: Caroline Brown

reviews.title: Good and bad
reviews.comment: The overlay doesn\'t function properly with the Samsung Galaxy Note 2 but other wise a very nice app.  -1 for overlay and-1 for functionality on my model of phone.  More of a pain to use than anything.  But still a very nice app.
reviews.author: Mike Kinney

reviews.title: Stupid
reviews.comment: Dictionary keeps suggesting words that can\'t work based on letter placements. Once a letter has been played it can\'t be played again. But your app doesn\'t know this and suggests words that contain multiples of letters already played.
reviews.author: Sean Murphy

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: This app is horrible. Tried to use it and it gave me like 50 different possibles, then after excluding the other letters, it was still about 12 possibles. I had too keep going back and forth. Just not worth it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I tried it but its no fun cheating.
reviews.comment: It takes away from the game! I don\'t even know why cheating apps are created!
